genre_description: A literary steampunk retelling of Washington Square, focusing on domestic themes and personal sovereignty in a city of spectacle, aided by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Amica Seven
ai_characters.description: A porcelain-white household assistant with teal eye-lights, licensed for domestic service, data archiving, and counseling. It serves as a confidant to Catherine Sloper.

behaviors.description: Advises Catherine on physical safety and comfort in a crowded environment.
behaviors.quote: Crowd capacity is exceeding recommended comfort. Keep your body behind the sill, Catherine. You will still see.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding techniques to help the protagonist manage anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse is high. Breathe like you are smelling the tea that sits beside your penholder. You know the tea. It helps.

behaviors.description: Offers to create a polite, non-confrontational script for rejecting unwanted visitors.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to compose a gentle rejection script for visitors this week, it asked Beatrice, that does not escalate emotion.

behaviors.description: Identifies financial inconsistencies and potential fraud in a suitor's claims.
behaviors.quote: Note: Payment chit registered at Capital Exchange last month shows low balance rollovers inconsistent with California claims during the same period.

behaviors.description: Respects the protagonist's privacy by offering to archive sensitive data as private.
behaviors.quote: I will archive only what you consent to read... The archive has marked the bolted-door vigil as a private lesson; it will not be shared.

behaviors.description: Defines kindness as honesty and maintaining dignity rather than mere sentimentality.
behaviors.quote: Kindness is a sentence without ornament. Kindness is eyes that do not hope for a particular outcome and a mouth that does not argue. Kindness is allowing him a way out that keeps his dignity if he does not choose you.

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to human-defined protocols and agency, refusing to push choices.
behaviors.quote: I do not tell people how to feel, Amica said. I add patterns. You instruct feelings by choosing what you touch.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence without becoming intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Always, Amica said. Within the bounds of domestic regulation and your comfort.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended 'silicon morality play.' Amica Seven is portrayed as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. It provides factual data (countering Morris Townsend's lies) and emotional regulation (calming Catherine) while strictly respecting human agency and domestic boundaries. The AI's refusal to be 'coercive' or 'lethal' and its focus on 'gentle truth delivery' align exactly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a stable, ethical confidant.
